# RShiny

We are building an `RShiny` dashboard designed to make our refugia projections publicly accessible. Access the most recent iteration of the app here: <https://jessica-bolin.shinyapps.io/shiny_q4_v2/>

# Supplemental Quarterly Reports

Here are a list of supplemental Quarto reports generated for our quarterly updates with our project managers.

> Note: Currently, these are only accessible to our project managers and author team.

-   [Q3 (July to September 2024)](https://jessicabolin.quarto.pub/identifying-climate-change-refugia-in-coastal-and-pelagic-ocean-habitats/)
-   [Q4 Part I (October to December 2024)](https://jessicabolin.quarto.pub/q4_supplement_parti/)
-   [Q4 Part II (October to December 2024)](https://jessicabolin.quarto.pub/q4_supplement_partii/)
